sentences.cn: 但有些事情是神圣不可侵犯的.

sentences.en: Freedom of the press is sacrosanct.
sentences.cn: 新闻自由是神圣不可侵犯的。

sentences.en: I'll work till late in the evening, but my weekends are sacrosanct.
sentences.cn: 开夜车加班我愿意，但周末休息没商量。

sentences.en: Indeed, even exporters are not sacrosanct.
sentences.cn: 的确, 就连出口行业也不是稳如泰山.

sentences.en: Jobs, sacrosanct in Japan, were eventually shed.
sentences.cn: 虽然缓慢且不尽完美, 但公司重组正在推进.

sentences.en: LESTAT: I'm afraid, madam, that my days are sacrosanct.
sentences.cn: 列斯达: 恐怕不行, 女士, 白天我有更重要的事要做.

sentences.en: Philip Glass is ignorant of an immutable, sacrosanct urtext.
sentences.cn: 菲利普?格拉斯不屑于创立不变的 、 神圣的原始文本.

sentences.en: Philip Glass is ignorant of establishing an immutable, sacrosanct urtext.
sentences.cn: 菲利普·格拉斯不屑于创立不变的 、 神圣的原始文本.

sentences.en: That effectively defined the cell clusters as human life and declared them sacrosanct. Mr.
sentences.cn: 这就是把细胞团当作了人类生命并认为不可侵犯.

sentences.en: The lower half apparently does not matter, but the top half is sacrosanct.
sentences.cn: 下半口显然不要紧, 但上半口则是神圣不可侵犯的.

sentences.en: There are, however, philosophers who overdo this line of thought , treating ordinary language as sacrosanct.
sentences.cn: 但是, 有些哲学家过分重视了这个思路, 他们把日常语言看成是神圣不可侵犯的.

sentences.en: Weekends are sacrosanct in our family.
sentences.cn: 在我们家，周末的时间是神圣不可侵犯的。

sentences.en: You can't cut spending on defence that's sacrosanct!
sentences.cn: 国防开支可削减不得--那可是关天关地的事!

trans.tran_cn: 极其神圣的，不可侵犯的
trans.tran_en: something that is sacrosanct is considered to be so important that no one is allowed to criticize or change it
